page.title: 14GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: In our school lots of different games are played in the playground.One game is Rotten Eggs.Rotten Eggs is played with a ball.You get in a circle then throw the ball around it.If someone drops the ball they have to run after it while the rest run away from it. When the person gets the ball he shouts stop and everybody freezes.Then he tries to hit someone.If he does then that person has to throw the ball up.If not he has to throw it.If somebody catches it they have a rotten egg.If they don't catch it they don't get a rotten egg. Another game is Sticky Glue.In Sticky Glue one person is on.When he tigs someone they have to freeze with their legs open.To get free someone has to crawl through their legs.
